transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Hello, Sarojini Engineering Works mein baat ho rahi hai meri?

Customer: Kahan se bol rahe ho?

Executive: Sir, Namaskar Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha hun senior manager IndiaMART head office se.

Customer: TradeMART kya bol rahe ho?

Executive: IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hun sir Shashank Tripathi senior manager kaise hain?

Customer: Theek hai sir badhiya.

Executive: Actually abhi aapne sir ek complaint raise kiya hua tha aapka jo hai na leads are not showing relevant and your representative asked for take the higher worth side package or something right?

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: To aap bataye sir kya exactly issue aa raha hai?

Customer: Dekhiye main leads par kaam jyada karta hun aur leads sahi nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Aur sir do teen months

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Jo mere catalog hai uske regarding koi bhi leads nahi hai aap check kar sakte hain.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Hmm. Ikka dukka aa bhi jati hai to wo turant khatam bhi ho jati hai.

Customer: Theek hai. Aur main ye do do char mahine se problem hai nahi jyada nahi teen char mahine se problem ho main keh raha hun unko.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Wo keyword vagera set kar dete hain.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Ek do din sahi aata hai fir wahi problem ho jata hai shuru aur

Executive: Keyword daily daily thodi

Executive: Sir koi set hota hai keyword to ek bar update ho jayega to wo ho jayega baki agar main by leads ki baat kar raha hun to by leads sir dekhiye abhi agar hum check kare to aapka near by aapke location se

Executive: Give me a second.

Executive: Sir GI pipe ka 23 by lead consume kiya hua hai aapne is month mein aur total by lead GI pipe ka jo post hua hai wo hua hai 73 73 bhi nahi 64.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To 64 mein aapne jo hai na by lead consume kiya hua hai 23 to theek to hai sir.

Customer: Nahi kahan matlab jo party mang mera jo catalog hai us regarding parties aa nahi rahi hai na unko kuch aur chahiye hota hai.

Executive: GI pipe client isme deal karte ho na aap?

Customer: Ji karte hain mere catalog dekh lijiye jo wahi karte hain.

Executive: Ha na wahi to wahi main bhi bol raha hun sir usi ka to aapne 23 by lead consume kiya hua hai na.

Customer: To 23 by leads mein sare sare okay hain ya kuch aur bhi alag hai?

Executive: Sir ab dekhiye ek cheez main batata hun agar aap buyer ko connect kar rahe ho buyer bolta hai nahi ji meri requirement puri ho gayi.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Buyer bolta hai ki nahi ji bhai jo hai na mere ko ye cheez nahi ye cheez chahiye thi theek hai usme product mein kahin na kahin kuch thoda sa difference nikalta hai IndiaMART by lead aapko product ka name dekh ke hi to provide karayega.

Customer: Agar nahi dekhiye problem kya problem name dekh ke aata hai sahi baat hai aap keh rahe hain to claims ke naam pe bhi kuch bhi aa jao claims plumbing system ab ye kya cheez product ho gaya mere regarding to nahi hai.

Executive: Kaun sa?

Customer: Ab matlab leads mein aati hai CPVC plumbing system theek hai astral CPVC pipe fittings CPVC claims with SS nail manufacturer ab ye to mere regarding aa nahi rahi automatic claim for conductor ab isme main kya kaam karun bataiye.

Executive: Aapne ek product dala hua hai SS pipe claim.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai to SS pipe claim mein jitni bhi tarike ki SS ki pipe claim hogi wo sari aayengi dusra aapne dala hai saddle clips.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Industrial claims ab agar aap ek cheez bataye industrial claims claims jo hai na ek badi category hai jisme SS ka bhi aayega iron wala bhi aayega ya jis bhi tarike ka industrial se related claims hota hai sare aayenge.

Executive: To aapko bas karna kya hai na sir isme dekhiye aapke by lead consumption jo hai na wo depend karta hai ki aapko jo hai na opportunity kis tarike ka aayega aap agar by lead jo hai na for an example kal ko aap shirt ki by lead agar consume karne lag gaye to do din baad aapko maximum by lead jo dikhenge wo shirts ke dikhenge kyunki aapke product updated kya hai isse jyada matter ye karta hai ki aap by lead kis cheez ka le rahe ho.

Executive: Theek hai na aap by lead agar ha aap aise samajhiye na sir abhi jaise aap bhi youtube facebook instagram kuch bhi aap chalate ho to aapko suggestions mein wahi to dikh raha hota hai jo aap dekh rahe hote hain regular basis pe.

Customer: Lekin mere catalog ke basis par koi bhi leads na aaye to kya karna padega?

Executive: To aap by lead aap not relevant mark kijiye na sir jo by lead aapke liye relevant nahi hai aur aapki screen pe dikhai de rahi hai to aap unko not relevant mark kijiye not relevant mark karne se aapko benefit ye hoga ki aapke jo bhi by leads rahenge usme aap jo hai na bifurcate kar paoge aur jaise hi aap not relevant mark karoge waise hi hamari team ke pass feedback pahunch jayega ki that client is don't want to deal in this particular category or the product right?

Executive: To wahan par total ke total aise hi rehte hain to kya karna padega nahi rehte nahi rehte na aap agar mere ko khud ye bata rahe hain ki bhai jo hai na is pure month mein agar aapne 50 by lead consume kiye hain to 50 by lead mein 23 aapne GI pipe ke consume kiye hain ab GI pipe mein aap aap agar GI pipe ka koi by lead consume kar rahe ho to samne se koi aisa to hai nahi ki wo sir koi different product mangega.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Sir CPVC mein kaam karta hun you PVC ka inki leads nahi aati hai matlab kya karna hai CPVC matlab ye main CPVC metal clamp mera kaam hai plastic plastic wale mere pass leads aati hai.

Executive: Reason bata deta hun CPVC metal claim nahi aapne dala hua hai sir CPVC claim aapne dala hua hai product mein.

Customer: To aapka isme nahi na hai kya keh raha hun mapping mein aapka nahi show karta hai.

Executive: Category mein CPVC metal claim nahi hai?

Customer: Mere ko idea nahi lekin CPVC claim hi show karta hai.

Executive: Available hai sir?

Customer: Han hai na.

Executive: To main ek kaam kar raha hun aapka video meeting arrange kara deta hun aap video meeting pe aa jao ek bar screen aapko bhi dikhegi hame bhi dikhegi to ek sath usko correct kar lenge.

Customer: Theek hai aaiye na.

Executive: Theek hai main aapko video meeting ka link share karwa do.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not relevant to the catalog.

- Leads are not coming correctly.

- Facing issue since last 3-4 months.



Resolution:

- Explained how to mark buyleads as not relevant.

- Offered a video meeting to correct the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share video meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, not relevant, video meeting
